question.text: As a driver why should you be more careful where trams operate?

explanation.text: You should take extra care when you first encounter trams. You will have to get used to dealing with a different traffic system. Be aware that they can accelerate and travel very quickly and that they cannot change direction to avoid obstructions.

answer.text: Because they do not have a horn
Because they do not stop for cars
Because they do not have lights
Because they cannot steer to avoid you
